pkgmetadata.longdescription: Learn and Apply Directed Acyclic Graphs for Causal Inference // Causal Inference Assistance (CIA) for performing causal inference within the structural causal modelling framework. Structure learning is performed using partition Markov chain Monte Carlo (Kuipers Moffa, 2017) and several additional functions have been added to help with causal inference. Kuipers and Moffa (2017) doi:10.1080/01621459.2015.1133426.
